Package com.g1.mychess.tournament.service

Interface TournamentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TournamentServiceImpl
public interface TournamentService
Service interface for managing tournaments, including operations for creating, updating, and retrieving tournaments, as well as managing player participation.

    • createTournament

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TournamentDTO> createTournament(TournamentDTO tournamentDTO, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates a new tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentDTO - the TournamentDTO containing tournament details
      request - the HTTP request, used for extracting user information
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created TournamentDTO

      Returns:
